This is the project page for Russell Dinnage, Anna Simonsen et al. project to map the distribution of nitrogen fixation in legumes across the globe.

So, far the project contains the following pages:

[Loading and Cleaning Data](http://rdinnager.github.io/GlobalNfix/CleaningData)

Getting and cleaning legume distribution data from GBIF and linking it with nitrogen fixation data of @Werner2014.

[ILDIS Webscraper](http://rdinnager.github.io/GlobalNfix/ILDIS_scraper)

A start on a basic web scraper for retrieving data on legume distributions from the International Legume Database and Information Service ([ILDIS](http://www.ildis.org))

[Working with TDWG areas](http://rdinnager.github.io/GlobalNfix/TDWG)

Loading up Taxonomic Databases Working Group shape files. We hope to link these up with ILDIS legume distribution data to map as many legume ranges as possible.

[Preliminary Latitude Analysis](http://rdinnager.github.io/GlobalNfix/Prelim_Analysis)

Preliminary analysis of latitudinal patterns in nitrogen fixation.
